attributes.review: This app will make you depressed that there are still people who get to vote in this country who cannot see through the prevarication, incompetence, narcissism, self-enrichment, and hostility to American institutions that defines the Trump Presidency.  Trump is a free-spending, deficit-creating, anti-free trade no nothing who has slandered our intelligence establishment while heaping praise on the Russians while lying about knowing that the Russians have been paying bounties to kill coalition forces.  Shameful man and bad app.
attributes.title: App has worthless content
